Scam Shield - AI Scam Detection and Prevention

Key Features:
- Real-time scanning of web content for scam patterns
- Specialized detection of crypto wallet and investment scams
- Meeting and job offer scam prevention
- AI-generated message pattern recognition
- Whitelist trusted sites
- Free and privacy-focused

How It Works:
Scam Shield analyzes web content in real-time to detect common scam patterns, including:
- Suspicious crypto wallet requests
- Fake meeting invitations
- AI-generated messages
- Technical support scams
- Trust-building manipulation
- Time pressure tactics

Privacy & Security:
- No data collection
- All scanning happens locally
- No external servers
- No personal information required

Perfect for:
- Crypto users
- Online job seekers
- Social media users
- Anyone concerned about online scams

Installation is quick and the extension works immediately to help protect you from increasingly sophisticated online scams.
